scripts.script-spec: cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/3-demo/ && npm run posttest
scripts.chrome-test: cypress run --browser chrome --spec cypress/e2e/3-demo/saucedemo.cy.js && npm run posttest
scripts.test: cypress run --reporter mochawesome || npm run posttest
scripts.posttest: npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-htmlreport
